Back to Franz Liszt

Franz Liszt

Klavierstück aus der Bonner Beethoven-Kantate, S. 507

c. 1846 · LW A126 · R. 198

[IMSLP]

This piece is based on parts of the first movement of the Bonner Beethoven-Kantate (S. 67; LW L1; R. 537). Liszt also made a vocal score (S. 67bis) and an arrangement for piano duet (S. 584; LW B6; R. 340) of the cantata.

Recommended editions

  • New Liszt Edition (Editio Musica Budapest) · I/11 · Z. A/B 6216 · Individual Character Pieces I · ed. Imre Mező / Imre Sulyok

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 3
